metadata.titel_preek: Wide Visions From A Narrow Window

kernfrasen: wide vision from a narrow window
window has narrowed to a slit
look out upon the landscape of life
dominante_domeinen.conceptuele_metafoor: PERCEPTION IS LOOKING THROUGH AN APERTURE

kernfrasen: God has overthrown me and has trapped me in his net
His troops come together and raise up their way against me
run through a troop and jump over a wall
biopsy, a sample of living tissue
heart broken and put together again
sides of the valley rise steep around you
moving however sadly toward some unknown valley
dominante_domeinen.conceptuele_metafoor: LIFE IS A PILGRIMAGE THROUGH TOPOGRAPHY

metafoor_inventaris.metafoor_expressie: The window has narrowed to a slit.

cognitieve_implicaties: Suffering limits what one can see of God's providence.
theologische_implicaties: Faith is the ability to see beyond immediate physical constraints.
ethische_implicaties: Persistence in looking 'out' despite the 'narrowness' of the situation.
onbedoelde_consequenties: Suggests God is 'outside' the window rather than 'inside' the suffering.

metafoor_inventaris.vitaliteit_toelichting: The preacher revitalizes the 'vision' metaphor by adding the physical constraint of the 'narrow window' and the 'slit,' making the abstract concept of hope feel claustrophobic and then expansive.

coherentie_analyse.coherentie_verklaring: The sermon maintains a strong tension between the 'Narrow Window' (the present plight) and the 'Wide Vision' (the future hope). It successfully blends the military imagery of God as an adversary with the medical imagery of the 'biopsy' to describe the human condition.

incoherentie_punten.locatie: Section on God's net vs. God's hand
incoherentie_punten.metafoor_b: God as Sustainer (take hold of our hand)
incoherentie_punten.conflict_beschrijving: God is simultaneously the one attacking and the only one who can save from the attack.
incoherentie_punten.entailment_conflict: The source domain of a 'net' implies a predator-prey relationship, while the 'hand' implies a parent-child relationship.

succesvolle_blending.locatie: Description of the Book of Job
succesvolle_blending.blending_strategie: The preacher uses 'biopsy' to validate the 'drama' as not merely fiction, but as 'living tissue' of human reality.

sterktes.beschrijving: Re-activates the 'Redeemer' metaphor by grounding it in the physical 'pus-filled sores' of Job.
sterktes.voorbeeld: This man takes the pus-filled sores and separates them as the scabs come off... gets up to look out.

risicos.beschrijving: The military imagery of God as an enemy who 'kindled his wrath' could lead to a view of God as a capricious tyrant.
risicos.voorbeeld: He hath counted me unto him as one of his enemies.
risicos.potentiele_impact: Congregants may fear God as a source of trauma rather than a source of comfort.

text_world_analyse.primaire_wereld: The ash heap/pallet of Job's misery.
sub_worlds: The Civil Rights South (bigotry and standard bearers)

deictic_shifts.effectiviteit: High; it universalizes the 'narrow window' of suffering.

versterkte_schemas.hoe_versterkt: By linking Job's suffering to the physical ailments of famous preachers and Christ.

verstoorde_schemas.schema_naam: Prosperity Gospel / God as Life Coach
verstoorde_schemas.verstoring_strategie: Emphasizing that God 'opposes' us to save us.
verstoorde_schemas.vervangend_schema: God as the Sovereign Surgeon/Adversary who breaks to heal.

schema_analyse.liturgische_schema_aansluiting: Strongly fits a funeral or a service of lament.

aanbevelingen.metafoor_audit_samenvatting: The sermon is dominated by 'Constraint' and 'Vision' metaphors. It uses architectural limitations (windows, slits) to describe the human condition and expansive 'landscapes' to describe the eschatological future. The military imagery is used effectively to describe the feeling of being 'overthrown' by life.

revitalisatie_suggesties.suggestie: Deepen the legal/economic source of 'Goel' (Kinsman-Redeemer) to contrast with the 'alien/stranger' imagery used in the text.
revitalisatie_suggesties.voorbeeld: The Redeemer is the one who buys back the field Job lost in the ruin of his fortune.

coherentie_verbeteringen.incoherentie: God as Enemy vs. God as Friend
coherentie_verbeteringen.resolutie_strategie: Use the 'Wrestling Jacob' metaphor to bridge the gap between God as adversary and God as blesser.

entailment_checks.problematisch_entailment: A biopsy is a passive procedure; it may remove human agency.
entailment_checks.aanbeveling: Balance with the 'Path' metaphor where the sufferer must 'walk' or 'run'.

alternatieve_domeinen.rationale: To connect with Job's 'fruitful fields' and 'removed tree' imagery.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A masterclass in using CMT to bridge the gap between ancient text and modern existential pain. The 'Narrow Window' metaphor is a profound cognitive tool for theodicy.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_esthetiek: While an aesthetic analysis would praise the 'rhythm' of the 'shalls,' CMT reveals that these 'shalls' function as a 'Path' schema leading the hearer out of a 'Container' of despair.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_kolb: Unlike Kolb's learning cycles, CMT focuses on the involuntary mapping of 'suffering' onto 'physical assault' (military domain).
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_CMT: CMT identifies that the preacher uses 'Verticality' (mountains, valleys, high religion) to signal the transition from human misery to divine sovereignty.

volledige_metafoor_lijst: Suffering shot through by a presence
Driven cold steel into his spirit
Blood marks are the seal of authority
Dumb dark thing that turns the handle
appendices.notities: The preacher utilizes the 'Black Homiletic' tradition of 'celebration' at the end, shifting from the 'Narrow Window' (Lament) to the 'Wide Vision' (Eschatology) through a rhythmic repetition of biblical 'shalls'.
